311819.「私たちは この先で 大きな町を見つけたの。\n だけど 取りつく島もなく\n:
We found a really big town down that way.
But the soldiers guarding the gate turned
us away...

311820.「仕方なく ここまで\n 戻ってきたところだったのよ。\n ねっ ジーガンフさん:
We didn't have any other choice, so we ended
up coming back this way.
Right, Jiganf?

311822.「この地方は 創生のチカラが\n 薄いんだなって 思ってたけど……\n このあた:
I had thought the power of creation was weak
in this region, but...it feels like it's
getting a bit stronger around here!

311823.「そうせいの……チカラ？\n 初めて聞く 言葉だわ。\n よければ どんなものか:
The power...of creation? I've never heard
of that. Mind explaining what that is?

311824.「あっ うん。えっとね……\n 創生のチカラは すべてを創りだし\n すべてを存:
Oh, sure. Umm... The power of creation is a
power that creates and brings everything
into existence.

311825.「土も水も ヒトも動物も この世に存在する\n すべてのモノは 創生のチカラを:
Soil, water, people, animals...everything that
exists in this world contains the power of
creation. That's what my master taught me...

311826.「うーん。\n 万物に宿る 生命のエネルギー……\n といったところかしら？:
Hmmm.... Something like...the life energy
that resides in all things?

311827.「それで あなたは\n 創生のチカラを 感じ取ることができるの？:
So you're saying you can sense the power of
creation?

311829.「すごい……すごいわ ポルテちゃん！\n お花を 咲かせるチカラといい\n あな:
Wow...that's amazing, Porte! The power to
make flowers bloom, and now this?
You're quite remarkable!

311832.「ええ もちろん！\n ポルテちゃんは 仲間ですもの。: Yes, of course! Porte is our friend.

311834.「まあ そうなの？\n さすがは ランガーオ村の武闘チャンピオンね！:
Wow, really? I guess that's something only the
champ of Langao's martial arts would know!

311837.「……そうね。そうしたいけれど まずは\n 町に入れてもらう方法……つまり 門番:
Well...yes. I'd like to, but first we have to
find a way to get in... That is, find a way
to gain the gatekeeper's trust...

311838.「とりあえず 今日のところは\n ここで 野営にしない？:
In the meantime, why not set up camp here for
the day?

311840.「さっ そうと決まれば さっそく準備しなきゃ！\n <pc>にも 手伝ってもらい:
Now that that's settled, we need to start
preparations right away! I'll need your help
too, so give me a shout when you're ready.

311841.「ね <pc>。\n メレアーデさんって 王女さまなのに\n すっごく 話しやす:
Hey, <pc>... Mereade may be a
princess, but she's so nice and so easy
to talk to!

311842.「でも……ジーガンフさんは\n ちょっと 怖い感じのヒトなのかな？\n メレアー:
But Jiganf...he's a bit scary, don't you
think? Mereade seemed a bit intimidated
too...

311844.川辺の休憩所に戻ってきた <cs_pchero>は\nメレアーデに まがまがしい:
Returning to the Riverside Rest Area,
<cs_pchero> gives Mereade the Ominous
Mushroom.

311845.「近くで見ると いかにも 毒がありそうな\n 見た目を しているわね！？ ごめん:
Looking at them up close, it looks like
they're poisonous?! Sorry, but I don't think
these are safe to eat...

311847.「まあ ジーガンフさんは\n このキノコを 食べたことがあるのね。:
Oh, so you've eaten these mushrooms before,
then?

311851.<cs_pchero>たちは ジーガンフが 見事な手際で\n作った おいしいスー:
The group filled their bellies with the
delicious soup that Jiganf had so skillfully
prepared! And then...

311852.「ありがとう ジーガンフさん。釣りざおの用意も\n お魚をさばくのも スープ作り:
Thanks, Jiganf. I ended up having to rely on
you for everything... Preparing the fishing
rod, cutting the fish, making the soup...

311853.「そうそう！\n ジーガンフさんって 意外と やさしいんだね。\n もっと 怖い:
Definitely! You're surprisingly kind. I
thought you'd be more scary!

311855.「マイユさんって もしかして……\n ジーガンフさんの恋人……とか！？:
Could it be...that Maille was your lover,
Jiganf?!

311859.それから ジーガンフは話した。\nランガーオ村に生まれ 幼なじみの マイユと\n:
After that, Jiganf told his story. He recounted his younger days in Langao Village and what it was like growing up
with Maille and Arold.

311860.村でいちばん強い男が マイユと結婚できること。\nしかし ある年の 武闘大会で\:
The village's tradition said that the strongest man could marry Maille. However, during a certain year's martial arts
tournament, Arold conceded to him.

311861.その くやしさに つけ込まれて\n伝説の悪鬼 ゾンガロンに操られ\n暴走してしま:
The demon of legend, Zongalon, had taken
advantage of his frustration, causing him to
go berserk...

311865.「なんて ロマンティックな話……あっ！\n ジーガンフさんにとっては\n つらい:
What a romantic story... Ah! It must've been
really painful for you. I'm sorry...

311867.「うん！\n あたしも メレちーも\n ジーくんの話 感動しちゃった！:
Yeah! Me and Merry were both moved by your
story, Jee!

311869.「メレちーも そう思うわ。\n 話してくれて ありがとう！ ジーくん！:
"Merry" thinks so too! Thanks for telling us
your story, Jee!

311878.「そうなんだあ……。\n みんな それぞれ 事情があるんだね。:
Yeah, I see... Everyone has their own
circumstances for coming.

311881.「先日 我が国を訪れたのは 貴殿だな。\n フーラズーラには 見えないが……\n:
It was you who visited our country the other
day, was it not? While you don't look like
a Hula Zula...you also do not look human.

311882.「あのっ！ もしや あなた方の国には\n 人間しかいないのでは！？ 彼は……ジー:
Wait! Are you saying that only humans live in
your country? Jee...he's a race called Ogre.
He's no monster!

311883.「悪いが 言葉は 信じられぬ。\n 貴殿らの正体……\n 我が槍にて 確かめさせ:
Sorry, but your words alone don't convince me.
I shall verify your true claims with my spear.

311884.「非礼を お詫びしよう 異国からの客人よ。\n 我が名は イルシーム。\n アマ:
As esteemed guests from foreign lands, allow
me to apologize for my rudeness. My name is
Ilseem. I am a warrior of the Amarak Kingdom.

311885.「私たちを 信じてくださるのですか？\n 魔物や 怪しい者ではないと……。:
So do you believe us now? That we're not
monsters or suspicious people...?

311886.「ああ。すまなかった お嬢さん。\n 我らのような男にとっては 矛を交えて語るの:
Yes. My apologies, ma'am. For men like us,
battle is usually the quickest way to
communicate.

311888.「あたしは ポルテ！\n こっちの お嬢さんは メレちーだよ。\n そして 我ら:
I'm Porte! This young lady right here is
Ms. Merry, and over there is <cs_pchero>,
our captain!

311889.「よろしく頼む。<cs_pchero>。\n メレチー。:
It's a pleasure to meet you, <cs_pchero>.
Merry.

311890.「あっ えっと……\n よろしくお願いします。: Ah, umm... It's nice to meet you, too.

311891.「それで お前たちは どこから来たのだ？\n オーガ……などという言葉は 初めて:
So, where do you hail from, exactly? I've
never heard of this Ogre...or any race other
than human, for that matter.

311892.「ええと 私たちは……とても 遠い場所から\n この地の調査に やってきました。:
Umm, well...we've come from very far away
to investigate this place.

311893.「私たちの住む地では オーガだけでなく\n さまざまな種族が 共存しているのです:
Where we're from, Ogres are just one of
the many races that coexist.

311894.「そうなのか……。俺もそうだが\n ほとんどの者は 国から出たことがない。\n:
I see... Most people, including myself, have
never been outside of the country. I once
again apologize for my ignorance.

311895.「そして……異国からの客人よ。\n もし よければ お前たちを招待させてほしい。:
My guests from foreign lands...if you would
allow, I would like to invite you to come with
me to my homeland of Amarak Kingdom.

311897.「ゆえあって 俺は ひとあし先に\n アマラークに 戻らせてもらうが……国の者に:
I'll return there ahead of you, and I'll tell
the citizens about you all. Including the
matter of your different race.

311898.「だが……もし 我が国の者が\n お前たちの姿を見て 驚いても\n 許してはくれ:
However...if the people are alarmed by your
appearance, could you forgive them? They
mean no offense.

311900.「感謝する。\n では アマラーク王国で会おう。: I appreciate it. I will see you all in Amarak.

311901.「これで 町に入れてもらえそうだね！\n ふわ……安心したら\n なんだか 眠く:
Guess they'll let us inside the town now!
Whew...I'm so relieved now that I'm
starting to feel sleepy.

311902.「もう 遅い時間だものね。\n 今夜は眠って 明日に備えましょう。:
It is pretty late. Let's rest for tonight and
prepare for tomorrow.

311903.<cs_pchero>たちは そのまま\n川辺の休憩所で 身体を休めた……。\n:
<cs_pchero> and co. take a much
needed rest in the Riverside Rest Area...
And then morning came!<me 64>

311904.「おはよう <cs_pchero>！\n さあ 出発しましょう。アマラーク王国は:
Good morning, <cs_pchero>!
We should get moving. Amarak Kingdom is just
beyond the Turbia Meadows.

311905.「アマラーク王国へ ようこそ！\n 事情は イルシーム卿より 伺っています。\n:
Welcome to Amarak Kingdom! Sir Ilseem has
already told us about you. Sorry for turning
you away the other day.

311906.「イルシーム卿でしたら\n 城に いらっしゃるはずです。\n 場所は…………:
If you'd like to see him, you'll find him
inside the castle. Just go...

311916.「待て！\n 食うなら オレを食え！:
Wait! If you're going to eat someone, then
eat me!

311918.「フーラズーラに 普通の攻撃は 効かない！\n しかし ひとりかふたり 人間を食:
Hula Zula are immune to ordinary attacks!
But if it eats a human or two, then that'll
satisfy it and cause it to leave!

311919.「さあ オレを食え！\n 罪なき民に代わり\n この命 よろこんで 捧げよう！:
Come on, eat me! I gladly offer my life in
place of those innocent!

311921.「怖いものか！ 怖いものかッ！\n アマラークに 栄光あれ……ッ！:
I'm not afraid... I'm not afraid...!
Glory be to Amarak...!!

311924.「ジーくん！ よかった無事で！\n 兵士さんも！:
Thank goodness you're safe, Jee!
And the soldier, too!

311926.「それは この槍……黒槍クバーラトのチカラだ。\n 黒槍は フーラズーラに効く\:
It is the power of this spear: the Black Spear
of Kubarat. It is the only weapon known that
is capable of affecting the Hula Zula.

311927.「イルシーム卿は この国で 並ぶ者なき戦士！\n ゆえに 王から 国宝である\n:
Sir Ilseem is a warrior without parallel in
this country! That is why the king gave him
that national treasure of our kingdom!

311928.「ただし フーラズーラは 倒したところで\n いくらでも わいて出て……突如\n:
However, even when defeated...that monster
will suddenly appear from nowhere with
naught a sound and eat humans.

311929.「この国は はるか 祖先の代から\n フーラズーラの脅威に 悩まされているのだ。:
This country has been plagued by the threat of
Hula Zula since ancient times.

311930.「そんな 恐ろしいものが 存在するなんて……。:
To think such a horrible thing really
existed...

311931.「この国は 危険だ。\n 故郷へ戻るなら 止めはしない。:
This country is quite dangerous. If you wish
to return home, I won't stop you.

311932.「しかし……もし まだ お前たちが\n この国の調査を望むなら 王に紹介してやろ:
But...if you still intend to explore this
land, I will introduce you to our king. Please
join me in Amarak Castle.

311934.「えと……行くよね？ アマラーク城。: Um...you're going, right? To Amarak Castle?

311937.「……では 町に出現した フーラズーラは\n イルシーム卿が 撃退し\n 犠牲者:
...So a Hula Zula appeared in town and Ilseem
was able to repel it? No casualties to report,
either?

311938.「はっ！ フーラズーラに食われかけた 私を\n 駆けつけた卿が 救ってくださいま: Yes! I was almost eaten by that monster!

311939.「あっ……しかしながら リズク王！\n イルシーム卿には 感謝しておりますが\n:
Ah...Your Majesty! It's thanks to Sir Ilseem
that I have no fear of death!

311940.「アマラークのために 命捧げるは 誇り。\n 先に旅立った 同胞や祖先も よろこ:
I am proud to give my life for Amarak. My
fellow brethren and ancestors who fell
before me will gladly welcome my soul.

311941.「……うむ。そなたらの覚悟こそ\n アマラークの至宝である。:
...Yes. Your resolve is the true treasure of
Amarak.

311942.「王よ。彼らが 先刻\n ご報告申し上げた 者たちです。:
Your Majesty. These are the individuals that
I had told you about.

311943.「ようこそ はるか 異国からの客人よ。\n 我が名は リズク。\n このアマラー:
Welcome, honored guests from a faraway land.
My name is Rizk. I am Amarak's king.

311944.「しかし 客人よ。そなたらも 見たであろう？\n フーラズーラという 正体不明の:
However...you have seen that unknown horror
that is the Hula Zula. The sooner you leave
this place, the better.

311946.「<pc>。\n この国には 調査のために来たけど……\n 困っている人を 見殺:
<pc>... We did come here for
investigation's sake, but...we can't just
leave these people in need.

311947.「陛下。この国の窮状を 見たからこそ\n 帰るわけには まいりません。:
Your Majesty. Now that I've seen what plagues
this country, I can't just leave.

311948.「ジーガンフの言うように フーラズーラを\n 倒せるかは わかりませんが……アマ:
I'm not sure if we can beat the Hula Zula as
Jiganf said...but would you allow us to help
in saving Amarak?

311949.「……異国からの客人よ。\n そなたらの申し出に 心から 感謝する。:
I wholeheartedly appreciate your generous
offer, my guests.

311950.「滞在中は この城の客間を 自由に使うといい。\n 客間は １階にある。\n ま:
You are free to use the castle's guest room
on the first floor during your stay here.
Why not rest there first?

311952.「さあ <pc>。\n お言葉に甘えて 客間に行きましょう。:
Come on, <pc>. I think it's best
if we head to the guest room.

311954.「おつかれさま <pc>！\n 私たちも サンプルを 集め終わっているわ。\n:
Nice work, <pc>! We just finished
up collecting our samples, too. Let's go
and wait for Dura in Amarak.

311957.「イルシームさんは ほとんど休まずに\n フーラズーラの襲撃に 備えてるって聞い:
I heard that you prepare for the Hula Zula's
attacks with barely any rest. You don't
even drink, either.

311958.「お前たちが思うほど\n 禁欲的な生活を しているわけでもないさ。\n 酒はやら:
I don't live as ascetically as you may think.
While I don't drink, I do enjoy sweets quite
a bit.

311959.「けれど 今だって\n 槍の鍛錬を されていたのでしょう？\n この国や……リズ:
However, even now...you're still honing your
spear skills, right? To protect this country,
and King Rizk...

311960.「…………ああ。\n 大恩ある先王に 報いねばならんからな……。:
...Yes. There is a great debt that I must
repay to our late ruler...

311961.「最近 このあたりに出没する\n 少年山賊というのは お前だね？\n シュタール:
So, you're that bandit boy that's been showing
your face around these parts, are you? Are
you with the Stahl Bandits?

311965.「ガキぃ？\n それは 名前じゃないだろう？: Kid?! That's not really your name, is it?

311966.「でも ほかの連中は\n おれのことを そう呼ぶ。昔から。:
But that's what the others call me. Since I
started.

311968.「腹が減っているだろう？\n 私と 一緒に おいで。\n 飯を食わせてやる。:
You must be hungry, right? Come with me.
I'll get you something to eat.

311970.「子は 国の宝。\n お前は 国の長たる私の 宝だから。:
The child is the treasure of our country.
As head of that country, you are my
treasure.

311972.「さあ 行こう。\n アマラークに戻ったら\n お前の名を 考えねばならないな。:
Come, let's go. I'll have to think of a name
for you once we return to Amarak.

311973.「……まあ。\n まずは 風呂に入ってもらおうかな。:
Well...I think a bath is in order before any
of that.

311974.「女王は 俺に 名をくれた。教育をくれた。\n 兵士という役目を 生きる場所をく:
The queen gave a name to me. She gave me an education, a place to live, a duty as a soldier... And when Rizk was born, she asked
me to be his brother...

311975.「すてきな方……。でも 私たちは\n 先王陛下を お見かけしたことがありません。:
What a wonderful woman... But we have yet to
see the previous ruler. You don't mean...?

311976.「女王は フーラズーラに食われた。\n リズクをかばって……幼いリズクの目の前で:
The queen was eaten by a Hula Zula trying to
defend Rizk...right before the young boy's
very eyes.

311977.「当時は 上級士官以上の兵士が 持ち回りで\n 黒槍を持って 巡回をおこなってい:
Back then, senior soldiers took turns carrying
the Black Spear on patrol. As a mere private,
I was only training inside the castle...

311978.「……だから イルシームさんは\n 国いちばんの 戦士になったんだね。\n 黒槍:
So that's why you became the greatest warrior
in the country. It was to protect Rizk with
the Black Spear...

311979.「まあ リズクには 自分や城より\n 町を中心に警備しろと 命じられているがな。:
Well, Rizk has been ordered to focus more on
guarding the town rather than himself or the
castle.

311982.「あっ そーだ イルシームさん！\n これから あたしたちの仲間の 学者さんが\:
Oh, by the way! Our scholar friend is coming
to Amarak Castle as we speak.

311983.「黒槍を見せたいから\n イルシームさんも 一緒に来てくれる？:
Could you come with us so that we can show
him the Black Spear?

311984.「承知した。\n では 城へ行こう。: Of course. Let's head for the castle.

311987.「ふむ……万物に宿る エネルギーか。\n たしかに ある流派の武術にも\n 似た:
Hrm...energy that resides in all things, you
said? There are similar teachings in certain
schools of martial arts, you know.

311989.「それで……これから どうする？\n 門番には 追い返されたが\n もう一度 あ:
Anyways...what now? The gatekeeper turned us
away, but are you going to go back again?

311990.「そうか。\n では オレは 薪でも用意してこよう。: Sure. I'll go get us some firewood.

311991.「薪の準備が できたぞ……ん？\n お前が持っているのは マガマガタケだな。\n:
The firewood's ready... Hm? Isn't that a malefic mushroom you're holding? It is poisonous, but tastes really good if you
prepare it correctly.

311992.「修行で よく山に こもっていたからな。\n 食事や料理も 修行の一環だ。……こ:
Since I often secluded myself in the mountains for training, meals and cooking were part of that. It's surprising to find something in
this world that's similar in Astoltia.

311993.「こいつと魚で スープを作るなら 先に\n マガマガタケの下処理を 済ませたほう:
If you're going to make a soup with this and the fish, then you'd better prepare the mushrooms first. When the pot comes to
a boil, add an Antidotal Herb, then.....

311995.「ああ……怖がらせていたのなら すまなかった。\n どうも オレは クチ下手でな:
Ah...sorry if I scared you. I'm not so good
with my words...even Maille used to laugh
at me.

311996.「いや オレたちは ただの幼なじみだ。\n マイユと 一緒になったのは 別の男で:
No...we're just childhood friends. Maille
ended up with another man... Well, it
doesn't matter what I say about it.

311997.「そんなオレを 止めてくれたのが\n 村を訪れていた <cs_pchero>だ。:
I was stopped by <pc> who happened
to be in the village at the time. I owe them
a debt of gratitude for that.

311998.「だが 勇者覚醒の証……世界中を照らした\n 白い光で ゾンガロンは ふたたび封:
But with the awakening of the Hero...the white light illuminated the world and sealed away Zongalon once again. Thus I regained my
sanity.

311999.「そして オレは 真の勝者であるアロルドと\n やつの花嫁の マイユが\n 村か:
And then I bid farewell to Aroldーthe true
victorーand his bride Maille as they left
the village.

312000.「つらいと言うより 情けない話だな。\n まあ……お前たちには\n 楽しんでもら:
It's more pathetic than painful, to be honest.
Anyways...I'm glad you all seem to be enjoying
yourselves.

312006.「……その後 オレは ゾンガロンを倒すべく\n 修行の旅に出たんだが……その間に:
...After that, I went on a training journey to
defeat Zongalon...but during then it seems
<cs_pchero> here already took care of it.

312007.「ああ……文句を 言いたいわけじゃないんだ。\n 間に合わなかったオレが 悪いだ:
Ah, well...I'm not complaining or anything.
It's my fault for not getting there in time,
that's all.

312008.「しかし 己の武を懸ける 目的を失って\n この先 自分は 何をすべきか……\n:
However, having lost my purpose of testing my own martial arts skills...I wondered what to do next. That's when I heard about the
exploration team.

312009.「ゾンガロンを倒すための修行で 鍛えあげた\n この拳にふさわしい 強敵との出会:
An encounter with a formidable foe worthy of
the training I endured to defeat Zongalon...
That's what I desire from this journey.

312010.「ハッ……さっそく\n オレの望みが かなうかもしれん。:
Heh... Maybe I won't have to wait long for
my desire at all.

312011.「まったくだな。\n オレの名は ジーガンフだ。\n また 手合わせしてくれ。:
Isn't that the truth? My name's Jiganf.
Let's spar again sometime.

312012.「気にするな。\n オレだって お前たちと同じ立場で\n オーガ以外の種族を見た:
No need to worry. Even I'd be surprised if
a saw a race other than an Ogre.

312014.「なんだと！？\n ならば……これは どうだああッ！:
What the...?! Let's see how you deal with
THIS then...!

312015.「くっ……なんなんだ こいつは！\n このオレの拳が まったく効かないだと！？:
Ggh...what is this thing?!
My attacks do nothing at all?!

312017.「おい 何を言っている！？\n 食えって まさか……！:
Hey, what do you mean?!
"Eat"...? Wait...

312018.「おい ふざけるな！\n オレは 頼んでないぞ！: Hey, that's crazy! I didn't ask for this!

312020.「あの化け物は いったい なんなんだ？\n オレの拳は 効かなかったのに\n な:
Just what IS that monster? My attacks didn't
do a thing, so what makes yours special?

312021.「このオレが 手も足も 出ないだと……？\n あの修行の日々は 無意味だったとい:
Am I powerless...? Were all those days of
training for nothing?!

312023.「悪いが そのつもりはない。\n やつを この手で ぶちのめすまでは 帰れん！:
Sorry, but I've no intention of leaving. Not
until I beat that monster to a pulp with
my own hands!

312025.「イルシーム卿と……国王陛下！？\n いったい どうされたのですか？:
Sir Ilseem, Your Majesty...?!
Is there something going on?

312026.「リズクが あらためて お前たちに\n 挨拶したいと 言うのでな。:
Rizk says that he'd like to greet you all
properly.

312027.「ごきげんよう 客人よ。\n この部屋の居心地は いかがですか？\n 不便があれ:
Greetings, dear travelers. I hope that you find this accommodation comfortable. If there's anything you need, please don't
hesitate to ask one of the castle's servants.

312028.「なんか 王さま……玉座の間で会ったときと\n 雰囲気ちがうね？ イルシームさん:
You feel...a bit different from when we met
you in the throne room. And Ilseem is calling
you by your name only...

312029.「俺は先王……リズクの親の代から仕えていてな。\n こいつのことは 赤ん坊のころ:
I've been serving since the time of the previous king...or Rizk's parents. I've watched over him since he was a baby.
Even changed his diapers, I did.

312030.「はは……彼の言うとおり イルシームは\n 私の 兄のような方なんです。城の者の:
Haha...he's right. Ilseem is like a brother to
me. Though inside the castle, we treat one
another as king and subject.

312031.「……イルシームから\n あなた方は 信頼できる人物だと聞き\n ひとりの男とし:
...I heard from Ilseem that you are all
trustworthy, so I came to properly
express my gratitude.

312032.「<pc>さん。縁もゆかりもない この国と\n 民のため チカラを貸してくださる:
<pc>. For lending your strength for
this country and its people, with whom you
have no connection... Thank you, truly.

312033.「ですが ひとつだけ 約束してください。\n この国のために 無理はしないと。\:
But you must promise me this... For the sake of this country, you mustn't push yourself too hard and you mustn't sacrifice yourself
for it.

312034.「お前たちも 見ただろう。\n この国の兵士は 死を いとわない……\n むしろ:
You have seen it. That our soldiers are
willing to die... In fact, they even consider
it to be a great honor.

312035.「黒槍以外の攻撃を 受け付けない\n フーラズーラという天敵を 抱えつづけ……\:
Over many years, our soldiers' consciousness has changed. Having to continuously endure attacks from the Hula Zula, which can only be
stopped by the Black Spear...

312036.「黒槍を持たぬ 一般の兵士たちに できるのは\n 民の身代わりとなって やつらに:
The only thing a common soldier is able to do is sacrifice themselves for their people and get eaten. In other words...pride by
death.

312037.「……王として 彼らの献身は ありがたい。\n むしろ そう思うように\n 過去:
As king, I do appreciate their devotion. In
truth, perhaps it was the kings of the past
who inspired them to think in such a way.

312038.「ですが 私自身は……誰も死なせたくない。\n みずから 命を投げうつことが 誇:
However, personally, I...I don't want anyone
to die. To pridefully throw away one's life...
That is no story worth telling!

312041.「ですから……先ほども言いましたが\n あなた方は けっして\n 無理をしないで:
So that's why...as I said before, please do
not push yourselves too hard.

312042.「けれど 不思議ですね <pc>さん。\n あなたなら 私たちを救ってくれるので:
But I do wonder, <pc>...
I really do think that you can save us. I
can't quite put my finger on why...

312044.「あっ そうだわ！ 私たち 黒槍と同じもの……\n レプリカを作れないかって\n:
Oh, right! We just talking about the
possibility of creating a replica of the
Black Spear...

312045.「私たちの仲間に とても優秀な 学者がいます。\n 彼は今 レストリア平野の先に:
We have a highly talented scholar in our group. He's currently at the edge of the Restoria Plains...would you be willing to
show the Black Spear to him?

312046.「なるほど。黒槍の複製は アマラークの歴史上\n 何度も試され 成功したことはな:
I see... Duplication of the Spear has been attempted many a time in Amarak's history with no success... But perhaps with exotic
knowledge and technology, it could be possible.

312047.「黒槍を お見せすること自体は 構いませんが\n この国から持ち出すことは 許可:
I don't mind showing him the Black Spear, but
I can't allow it to leave this country due to
the risk of an attack by the Hula Zula.

312048.「申し訳ありませんが その学者の方を\n この国に 連れてきてくださいませんか？:
I apologize, but could you please bring that
scholar here?

312049.「あっ……たしかに おっしゃるとおりです。\n わかりました。\n 仲間を 連れ:
Ah, of course, you are absolutely right.
We will bring him here.

312050.「すまんが 頼む。\n では……俺たちも\n そろそろ 失礼するとしよう。:
Sorry, but we'll leave this to you.
Then, we shall take our leave now.

312051.「よしっ！\n それじゃ あたしたちは ドゥラくんを迎えに\n はじまりの地へ:
Okay! Let's head to the Land of Beginnings
and go pick up Dura!

312053.「大したウデだな。\n お前ほどの 武の持ち主は アストルティア……\n オレた:
You're quite skilled. In our homeland of
Astoltia, there aren't many people like you
in terms of martial arts.

312054.「つまり イルシームの武は\n 守るための武……ということか。:
In other words...your skills are meant for
defense...right?

312055.「オレの武は……\n つねに オレ自身のための武だ。:
My martial arts...they've always been for my
own sake.

312056.「……みなさんに集めてもらった サンプルを\n 検証した結果 鉱石や植物 水など:
I have verified that the samples you have collectedーsuch as ores, plants, and waterー are not so different from the kinds that exist
in Astoltia.

312057.「たとえば 鉄鉱石などは\n アストルティアのそれと\n 完全に 成分が 一致し:
The composition of the iron ore you
found, for example, matches the composition
of those found in Astoltia perfectly.

312058.「しかし 黒槍は……まったく 未知の物質で\n 構成されており 現時点での複製は:
However, the Black Spear is composed of a
completely unknown substance. Replicating
at this point will prove quite difficult.

312059.「さて どうしたものか……黒槍が 遠方で\n 作成された可能性も 考えられる。\:
So, what to do... It is possible the Black Spear was created in a faraway place. Perhaps we need a sample from a different
region?

312061.「ほう。そこまで断言するなら\n 何か対案を 聞かせてもらえ……おや？:
Well, if you're so sure of yourself, then
let's hear your counter argumeー
...what?

312062.「見慣れぬ顔だな。\n この子供は いったい……？:
I don't recognize them. Just who is this
child...?

312063.「こんにちは！\n 私は メレアーデ。\n あなたの お名前は？: Hello! I'm Mereade! What's your name?

312065.「ラキ！ すてきな名前ね。\n ラキは どうして お城にいるの？\n お母さんは:
Raki! What a nice name! What are you doing
in the castle? Is your mother around?

312066.「ラキに 母は いない。\n いるのは とうさまと……ねえさま。:
Raki has no mother. He has a father...
and a sister.

312067.「……そう。お姉さんが いるのね。\n じつは 私にも 弟が……いるのよ。:
...I see, you have a sister. I have a little
brother too, you know...

312068.「おまえたちが黒槍と呼ぶ それは……\n ラキのとうさまが 創った。:
That which you call the Black Spear...
it was created by Raki's father.

312069.「でっ でも 黒槍って 建国前から……\n 少なくとも ３００年前には\n お城:
B...but the Black Spear's been here since
before this country was founded... That's
at least 300 years, right?

312070.「ラキ。黒槍について くわしく知りたい。\n お前の父さまと 話をさせてもらえな:
Raki...I would like to know more about the
Black Spear. May I speak with your father?

312072.「かわりに 知っていることを おしえる。\n 黒槍は フーラズーラに効く。\n:
Instead you will be told what Raki knows. The Black Spear is indeed effective against the Hula Zula. However, it is not the Black
Spear that is the effective part.

312073.「……ごめんなさい ラキ。\n 私には 少し むずかしいわ。:
Sorry, Raki... It's a bit difficult for me to
understand what you mean.

312074.「ハディン採石場の 奥。\n そこで ぜんぶ おしえる。\n 入れるようにしてお:
The back of the Hadine Quarry. Everything will
be told to you there. You will be let inside.
...so come.

312076.「シュタール鉱野にある 大昔に 閉鎖された\n 採石場だ。フーラズーラが 大量に:
It's a closed off quarry in the Stahl
Minefield. The Hula Zula have infested the
area and caused extensive damage.

312077.「シュタール鉱野……あっ！\n あたしたち そこ 知ってるかも。\n 四角い岩で:
Stahl Minefield...? Oh! I think I remember
that place. That's the place where there was
that blockage of square rocks, right?

312078.「そのとおり。\n 誤って 人が立ち入らないように\n 入り口を 封鎖してあるの:
Exactly right. The entrance has been sealed
off to prevent accidental entry.

312079.「ラキよ。入れるようにするなどと言うが\n そう 簡単には…………:
Raki...you say "you will be let inside" but
it's really not so eas...

312081.「なんとも 得体の知れない子供だ……。\n やつの言うことを 信じるつもりか？:
What a mysterious child... Are you really
going to believe what he says?

312082.「正直 信じていいかは わからない。\n でも……あの子を 放ってはおけないわ！:
Honestly, I don't know if I can trust him.
But we can't just let him wander off! So,
I'm going to Hadine Quarry.

312083.「俺からも 頼む。様子を 見てきてくれ。\n 黒槍やフーラズーラについて 何か:
Do me this favor as well. Please go and see for yourselves. If you can find anything at all about the Black Spear or Hula Zula, we
may have even the smallest of a chance.

312084.「……わかった。\n ハディン採石場へ行くぞ <pc>。:
...Got it. Let's make our way to the Hadine
Quarry, <pc>.

312085.「私は はじまりの地に 戻ります。\n <pc>隊長たちも お気をつけて。:
I'll be returning to the Land of Beginnings.
Be careful out there, all of you.

312087.「用心しろ メレアーデ。\n 入り口の岩を 砕いたのが\n そいつだってことを:
Careful, Mereade. Don't forget he's the one
who smashed the rocks at the entrance.

312088.「だって……そうしないと\n おまえたちが 採石場に入れないから。:
Yes...otherwise, you wouldn't have been able
to get inside this quarry.

312089.「ええ 助かったわ。\n ありがとう ラキ。:
Yes, that was a big help.
Thank you, Raki.

312091.「まったく……。で？\n わざわざ こんな場所まで 呼び出して\n お前は オレ:
Sheesh... So? What do you plan on teaching us
all the way down here?

312092.「ラキは 知ってる。フーラズーラは\n 黒槍自体に 弱いわけじゃない。:
Raki knows. Hula Zula is not vulnerable to
the Black Spear itself.

312093.「やつらを 傷つけるために\n ほんとうに必要なのは……創生のチカラ。:
What we really need to hurt them...is the
power of creation.

312094.「えっと……創生のチカラって\n たしか ポルテちゃんが言っていた\n 万物に宿:
Let's see... The power of creation is the life
energy that resides in all things. That's
what you said, right Porte?

312095.「そのはずだけど……創生のチカラがあれば\n あの化け物を やっつけられるって\:
That should be the case, but...what do you
mean we can beat that monster using the
power of creation?!

312096.「ラキは 事実を 言っているだけ。\n 黒槍が フーラズーラに効くのは あの槍が:
Raki just speaks the truth. The Black Spear
is effective against the Hula Zula because
it contains a strong power of creation.

312097.「黒槍じゃなくても\n 創生のチカラが宿る 攻撃なら\n フーラズーラを 倒せる:
Even if it's not the Black Spear, if it's
an attack imbued with the power of creation,
then it can defeat the Hula Zula.

312098.「うーん……\n 創生のチカラが宿る 攻撃……？:
Hmmm...an attack imbued with the power of
creation...?

312099.<center>ふむ……万物に宿る エネルギーか。\nたしかに ある流派の武術に:
Hrm...energy that resides in all things, you
said? There are similar teachings in certain
schools of martial arts, you know.

312100.「創生のチカラ…… 生命のエネルギー……\n 武術で言う 『気』のようなもの……:
The power of creation...life energy...
It's just like the concept of "chi" in
martial arts...

312101.「もしや……気を集中させた 攻撃ならば\n フーラズーラを 倒せるのか？:
What if...a focused attack could take down
the Hula Zula?

312102.「そう。\n おまえなら わかると思っていた。:
Right. It was known that you would
understand.

312109.「ジーくん すごい……\n フーラズーラを やっつけちゃった……！:
Jee, you'e amazing...! You beat the Hula
Zula...!

312110.「創生のチカラを宿す 攻撃……つかんだ！\n これで フーラズーラを倒せる！:
An attack imbued with the power of creation...
I've got it now! We should be able to beat
the Hula Zula with this!

312112.「いいか <cs_pchero> こいつは\n お前が倒せ！ 気を集中させるんだ:
Listen, <cs_pchero>! You take that
thing down! Concentrate your chi. Then
your attacks will work against it!

312113.「本来 これを会得するには 修行が必要だが……\n お前なら 今この場で つかめ:
It takes much practice to master this...
But I'm sure you'll figure it out!

312114.「ふう……やったな <cs_pchero>。\n これからは お前も フーラズー:
Whew...good job, <cs_pchero>.
You should now be able to defeat the
Hula Zula as well.

312115.「よかった……。\n 守ってくれて ありがとう ふたりとも！:
What a relief... Thank you both for protecting
us!

312118.「フーラズーラ……\n 今は そう呼ばれている あいつらは\n 城に住みついた人:
The beings you now call the Hula Zula...
they've been eating the humans that
live within the castle.

312119.「住みついて すぐには ぜんぶ食べない。\n 少しずつ 食べる。\n やつらが:
They don't eat everything as soon as they
settle. They eat little by little. Just enough
to sustain their lives.

312120.「城を中心に 町が栄えるのを待って……人間が\n いっぱいになったら 一気に 食:
They wait for the town around the castle to flourish...and once the humans have sufficiently multiplied, they devour them
all at once. They've repeated this cycle for many, many years.

312121.「そんな おそろしいことが……！？\n でも たしかに\n アマラークで聞いた話:
What a horrible thing... But that does match
what we heard back in Munieka.

312122.「リズク王の祖先が 城を見つけ 定住した。\n 少しずつ町は発展し 人が増えた。:
King Rizk's ancestors discovered that castle and settled there. Little by little, the town and its people grew. Eventually, the Hula
Zula appeared...

312123.「今は ひとりかふたり 人間を食べると\n 満足して消えるって 言ってたよね。:
They say now that the Hula Zula just eat one
or two humans, and then leave satisfied.

312124.「けど……いつかは アマラークの人たち\n 全員を 食べつくしてしまうってこと！:
But...does that mean they'll one day eat all
the people in Amarak?!

312125.「アマラークは もうずいぶん 大きくなった。\n いつ 滅ぼされても おかしくな:
Amarak has grown quite large. It'd be no
surprise if it were destroyed now.

312126.「ちょっと 待て。\n なぜ お前のような子供が それを知っている？\n 砕かれ:
Wait just a minute. How the heck does a kid
like you know that? Not to mention shattering
rocks...just who are you?!

312128.「もぉ しつこいっ！\n それに 今度は たくさん……！:
Rggh! So persistent! And there's a lot this
time!!

312129.「何体だろうと 同じこと！\n 行くぞ <cs_pchero>！:
No matter how many, it'll end just the same!
C'mon, <cs_pchero>!

312131.「いけない！\n きっと 今のやつらは アマラークへ向かった。\n あの国を 滅:
No! They're definitely headed to Amarak.
They're going to destroy it!

312132.「侵攻は いつ 起こっても\n おかしくない状況だった。けれど……きっと\n 今:
They could have invaded any time they wanted
to. But, surely...this battle was the catalyst
for their decision!

312133.「お前は ここに オレたちを呼び\n やつらと戦わせた。すべて\n お前の 仕組:
You brought us here and made us fight them.
Is this not all your doing?

312134.「……おまえたちを 呼んだのは\n フーラズーラが出てくるであろう この場所で\:
...You were called here to learn to fight
them. This place is where the Hula Zula
appear.

312135.「知識だけで 戦いは できない。\n 実践しないと 身につかない……\n とうさ:
A battle can't be fought with knowledge alone.
You have to apply that knowledge...
...that's what father said.

312137.「でも それで\n アマラークを滅ぼしては 意味がない。:
But destroying Amarak won't accomplish
anything.

312138.「ラキは 見てきた。\n ずっと ずっと 見てきた。\n たくさんの国が……人が:
Raki has seen it. For a long, long time.
Many countries...their people being eaten.

312140.「おねがい！ アマラークを助けて！\n 言いつけで ラキは 手出しできない。\n:
Please! You have to help Amarak!
Under orders, Raki cannot help you.
But you...!

312142.「わかっている。ラキの正体は ともかく\n アマラークの危機を 放ってはおけん。:
We know. I don't care who Raki really is,
but we can't ignore the crisis in Amarak.
Let's go, <cs_pchero>!

312146.「ラキに こいつらとの戦い方を 教わった！\n オレたちも 加勢する！:
Raki taught us how to fight them!
We'll join you!

312147.「感謝する！\n お前たちは アムル広場へ行ってくれ！:
Much appreciated!
Please go to the Amul Plaza!

312148.「フーラズーラの数が 多すぎる。\n 俺だけでは 手が回らん！:
There are just too many Hula Zula. I can't
handle them all myself!

312151.「メレアーデ！ ポルテ！\n この子を 頼む！: Mereade, Porte! You take care of this girl!

312152.「大丈夫？ ケガはない！？: Are you okay? Are you hurt?!

312154.「<cs_pchero>！ ジーくん！\n お願い……こいつ やっつけちゃって！:
<cs_pchero>, Jee!
Please, you gotta beat it!

312159.「タスケテ。タスケテ。タスケテ。\n タスケテ。タスケテ。タスケテ。\n タスケ:
HELP ME... HELP ME... HELP ME...
HELP ME... HELP ME... HELP ME...
HELP ME... HELP ME...

312160.「しゃべった……よな？\n なんだったんだ いったい……。:
Did it...just talk? What was that all
about...?!

312162.「町中のフーラズーラが 一斉に 姿を消してな。\n お前たちが 親玉を倒してくれ:
The Hula Zula all over town have been
disappearing. You defeated their leader,
didn't you? I knew you could!

312165.「相棒が 食われちまった……。\n あいつが かばおうとした 子供と一緒に……。:
My partner was eaten...along with the child
he was protecting...

312166.「国のために 命を捧げるのは 怖くない。\n けど 食われても 民を救えないのな:
I am not afraid to give my life for my
country. But if I'm eaten without saving
anyone...then I'd have died for nothing!

312167.「聞け アマラークの戦士たち！\n フーラズーラの倒し方が わかった。\n 黒槍:
Hear me, warriors of Amarak! I know how to
defeat the Hula Zula! They can be beaten
without the Black Spear!

312168.「コツさえつかめば 誰でも やつらと戦える！\n 戦い方は オレが教えよう。\n:
Anyone can fight them once they grasp the
concept! I will teach you how. Those who
wish to fight, come to me!

312169.「フーラズーラを 倒す方法だと……？\n 何百年も 探しつづけて\n 見つからな:
A way to defeat the Hula Zula...? How could
a stranger find something that we've been
searching for for hundreds of years?

312170.「しっ 信じられるものか……。\n 黒槍なしで やつらと 渡り合うなんて！\n:
I...I can't believe that...! To confront them
without using the Black Spear...that's
just impossible!

312171.「なんだよ……。\n なんで 兵士たちは 何も言わないんだ？\n 戦うのが 仕事:
What is going on...why aren't the soldiers
saying anything? Is it not their job to
fight?!

312172.「知らない……どうでもいい。もう 疲れた……。\n いっそ 食べられて 楽になり:
I don't know...and I don't care anymore.
I'm so tired...I just want to be eaten, so
I can finally be at ease...

312173.「せっかく ラキから\n 戦い方を 教えてもらったのに……\n みんな すっかり:
Even though Raki taught us how to
fight them...everyone's spirits have been
completely shattered.

312174.「……無理もない。\n このような規模の襲撃は 初めてだ。\n 兵だけでなく 民:
It's no wonder... I've never seen an attack of
this magnitude. Not only have our soldiers
been shaken, but the people, too.

312176.「……どうした！\n 誰もいないのか！？\n フーラズーラを倒したくないのか！:
...What's the matter with you all?
Is there no one here who wants to defeat
the Hula Zula?!

312177.「私は知りたい。教えてくれ。: I want to know. Please, tell me.

312179.「ジーガンフ殿。\n フーラズーラとの戦い方を\n どうか 私に 教えてほしい。:
Sir Jiganf. Please indulge me on how I can
defeat the Hula Zula.

312180.「この２００年は 耐え忍ぶしかなかった。\n しかし これ以上は もう……\n:
We've endured this hell for the last 200
years. But no more! I will no longer
allow Amarak's people to die!

312181.「陛下に続く者は いるか！？:
Is there anyone who wishes to follow His
Majesty?!

312182.「そ……そうだ。\n 陛下にだけ 戦わせてなるものか！\n 俺にも 戦い方を 教:
H...he's right. I won't allow His Majesty to
fight alone! Teach me how to fight them!

312184.「あのっ！ 私にも 教えてくれますか？\n もう 兵士さんに守られるのは……\n:
Umm...will you teach me, too? I don't want to
have to rely on the soldiers anymore...I don't
want only them getting hurt!

312185.「わたしにも……戦えるかなあ？\n そしたら 今度また あいつらが\n おうちに:
Do you fink...I can fight too? Next time
they come by my house, I'm gonna
beat 'em up...!

312186.「……ああ！\n 男も女も 大人も子供も 関係ない！\n 望む者 全員に教える。:
...Yes! It matters not if you're man or woman,
adult or child! I will teach all who wish to
learn. Let us fight together!

312187.「<cs_pchero>。調査の途中で すまないが\n オレは この国に残る。ア:
... I apologize for interrupting your exploration, but I will stay here. I will guide these people in the ways of
combat.

312188.「……今まで 武をみがくこと自体を 目的にして\n 生きてきた。だが この国に来:
I've lived my whole life with the purpose of
honing my own skills. But here...I think I've
finally found a use for them.

312189.「ジーくん。\n 私も あなたの選択は 正しいと思うわ。\n どうか アマラーク:
I think you've made the right choice, Jee.
Please protect Amarak well.

312190.「メレアーデ……。\n お前とチームを組めて よかった。\n 感謝している。:
Mereade...it's been a pleasure teaming up
alongside you. Thank you for everything.

312191.「ね <cs_pchero>。\n ジーくん なんか 変わったね。:
Hey, <cs_pchero>...
Jee's changed somehow, don't you think?

312192.「あなた方のおかげで ２００年にわたる\n 絶望的な戦いに 光明が見えてきた。\:
Thanks to all of you, we finally have a small
glimmer of hope in our 200 years of desperate
struggle. Please accept this as my thanks.

312193.「あなた方のおかげで ２００年にわたる\n 絶望的な戦いに 光明が見えてきた。\:
Thanks to all of you, we finally have a small
glimmer of hope in our 200 years of desperate
struggle. Words cannot thank you enough.

312194.「星封の結晶が 青く光ってる……。\n ってことは 星のオーラが 手に入ったんだ:
The Benevogem's glowing blue...that means
we got Benevolessence!
Way to go, <cs_pchero>!

312195.「ひとまず この国の調査は 終了かしら。\n ジーくんは アマラークに残るけど\:
I guess our exploration in this country is finished for the time being. Jee will stay here, but I'll return to the Land of
Beginnings sooner or later!

312197.「言いつけどおり あの者たちを 導けました。\n ラキは あなたの お役に立てま:
Just as you instructed, those people were
guided. Was Raki of use to you, sister...?

312198.この地方の 調査を終えた。\n引きつづき ほかの地方の 調査に向かおう。:
The exploration of this region has been
completed. Continue to explore the remaining
regions.

312199.調査隊を派遣した\n３つの地方 すべてで 調査を終えた。\nはじまりの地へ 戻ろ:
Now that all three regions have been explored,
head back to the Land of Beginnings.

317255.「で……出た！\n フーラズーラが 出たぞーっ！: I...it's here! Hula Zula is here!!!
